overview: A bittersweet drama that documents the relationship dynamics between two young men, Sam and Will, over a period of time, placing their romantic feelings under scrutiny. The film depicts their very human sense of fragility and vulnerability, but ultimately, also of their maturity. Piece by piece, they develop a bond, but love has its own limitations, bit by bit, we see their certainty slip away. Following a chance encounter, the pair discover that they still care for each other. Despite residual feelings, they simply acknowledge their shared past, recognizing that love can come in many forms.
title: A Little Bit
